channel.title: Desktop Blank Xfce not working ?
channel.description:
Hello, after reboot, the Whonix Workstation in KVM does not load the GUI. It only shows the background color of the desktop. No Symbols. Live mode does also not work. Rescue mode works.
What to do ? :frowning:

item.title: Desktop Blank Xfce not working ?

item.description:
Hello,
after reboot, the Whonix Workstation in KVM does not load the GUI.
